entry.name: selIcon
entry.label: Which image will used for the display. 1 = drop 2 = glass 0 = custom

entry.name: customImage
entry.label: Path to a custom svg or png

entry.name: selAnimStyle
entry.label: Which animation to use true=opacity fasle=fillup

entry.name: selPulse
entry.label: Pulse the icon when timer expires

entry.name: selSound
entry.label: Play a sound when timer expires
